name: WhatGame
0:
”Alexa, open what game”
”Alexa, ask what game who should take out the trash”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: what game
des: Next time you're trying to decide what game to play, just ask Alexa for help. For example, if you're trying to decide whose turn it is to pick a game on game night, Alexa can randomly select a game from the list.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
